20101230000558.000|20101230000602.000|CC1|KICKED US OUT.

20101230000604.000|20101230000606.000|CC1|CRUMBLING, PLASTIC SHEETING     
20101230000606.000|20101230000607.000|CC1|PROTECTING WHAT HASN'T

20101230000610.000|20101230000611.000|CC1|ARE UNDER A MANDATORY           
20101230000611.000|20101230000612.000|CC1|EVACUATION ORDER.               
20101230000612.000|20101230000614.000|CC1|>> WE NEVER UNPACKED

20101230000614.000|20101230000615.000|CC1|WE HAD EVERYTHING IN OUR        
20101230000615.000|20101230000617.000|CC1|SUITCASES READY TO GO.          
20101230000617.000|20101230000619.000|CC1|>> OFFICIALS HAVE TAKEN

20101230000620.000|20101230000622.000|CC1|THE LATEST ROUND OF RAIN,       
20101230000622.000|20101230000625.000|CC1|SANDBAGGING STREETS, DIGGING    
20101230000625.000|20101230000626.000|CC1|OUT A DRAINAGE CHANNEL AND      
20101230000626.000|20101230000627.000|CC1|PUMPING WATERS INTO A CATCH     
20101230000627.000|20101230000629.000|CC1|BASIN IN HOPES OF DIVERTING     
20101230000629.000|20101230000630.000|CC1|WATER AWAY FROM HOMES.          
20101230000630.000|20101230000633.000|CC1|>> IN NEARBY LOMA LINDA, THE    
20101230000633.000|20101230000639.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA CONSERVATION         
20101230000639.000|20101230000641.000|CC1|CORPS HELPED RESIDENTS          
20101230000641.000|20101230000642.000|CC1|SHOVEL MUD AFTER A HILLSIDE     
20101230000642.000|20101230000643.000|CC1|GAVE WAY.                       
20101230000643.000|20101230000644.000|CC1|>> THERE'S GOING TO BE A        
20101230000644.000|20101230000645.000|CC1|MESS.                           
20101230000645.000|20101230000646.000|CC1|>> ALL THE WORK TO PROTECT      
20101230000646.000|20101230000648.000|CC1|HOMES HAS NOT GONE              
20101230000648.000|20101230000649.000|CC1|UNNOTICED.                      
20101230000649.000|20101230000650.000|CC1|>> THE WORKERS HAVE DONE AN     
20101230000650.000|20101230000651.000|CC1|INCREDIBLE JOB, WORKING         
20101230000651.000|20101230000653.000|CC1|NIGHT AND DAY TO MAKE SURE      
20101230000653.000|20101230000655.000|CC1|THE HILLSIDE IS SECURE AND      
20101230000655.000|20101230000657.000|CC1|THEM DOING THAT MAKES ME        
20101230000657.000|20101230000658.000|CC1|FEEL SAFE.                      
20101230000658.000|20101230000700.000|CC1|>> AND WHILE RESIDENTS ARE      
20101230000700.000|20101230000701.000|CC1|THANKFUL, SOME HOMEOWNERS       
20101230000701.000|20101230000702.000|CC1|ARE GROWING FRUSTRATED WITH     
20101230000702.000|20101230000703.000|CC1|THE LACK OF RESPONSE FROM       
20101230000703.000|20101230000704.000|CC1|THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT.         
20101230000704.000|20101230000705.000|CC1|>> WE'RE HOPING THAT FEMA       
20101230000705.000|20101230000707.000|CC1|COMES IN AND STEPS IT UP AND    
20101230000707.000|20101230000709.000|CC1|STARTS TAKING CARE OF US.

20101230000713.000|20101230000714.000|CC1|AS YOU CAN SEE, THERE'S A
